O=
OC - GUH, didn't realize they were outside of the base.  My bad, thanks for=
 going with it.

<NEW - VICE GRIP AND DINOBOT>

With VICE GRIP still mostly=
 incapacitated, there was a feral looking grin from DINOBOT, "I see that it=
 is still possible to indulge oneself in learning thier proper place.  Woul=
d you deny your Master such simple pleasures now, Soldier?"  As he walked a=
long wtih INFERNO back towards the base.

Then pausing as he nodded over at=
 SKY SHADOW, "We can only hope that wahtever damage he has had sustained to=
 himself has furthered his own level of incapacitation for now."  Then upon=
 seeing WASPINATOR's damaged shoulder, his optics flickered over..

Somethi=
ng low and building in the air..  Finally, for a moment all was quiet as th=
e new DINOBOT gave in and indulged himself, "For old time's sake."  Movign =
then to assault WASPINATOR, trying to yank out his arm and then bonk him ov=
er the head with it.

OOC - Could..  Not..  Resist..  The amusement of maul=
